sql.content: SELECT A.arpID ,A.templateID ,A.arID ,B.participantTypeID AS "participantType.participantTypeID" ,B.participantType AS "participantType.participantType" ,B.infoComment AS "participantType.infoComment" ,A.objectType ,A.objectID ,A.objectName ,A.objectNo ,A.createrID ,A.creater ,A.createTime FROM TActivityRouteParticipants A ,TParticipantType B WHERE A.objectType = B.participantTypeID AND A.templateID = ':templateID' ORDER BY A.arID ,B.objectNo ,A.objectNo
